title: Stage Lv5-A2-S07
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: That's an intriguing question. I is likely to elaborate on this in detail. (academic variant 1)
That perspective appears to be worth considering, but alternative interpretations are possible. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 흥미로운 질문입니다. 이에 대해 자세히 설명드리겠습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: That's an intriguing question. I is likely to elaborate on this in detail. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그 관점은 고려할 만하지만 다른 해석도 가능합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: That perspective appears to be worth considering, but alternative interpretations are possible. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구의 한계점을 지적해 주셔서 감사합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Thank you for pointing out the limitations of the research. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 반대 논증을 제시해 주신 것에 대해 응답하겠습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I is likely to respond to the counterargument you have presented. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 문제에 대한 학계의 견해가 분분한 것이 사실입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: It appears to be true that academic opinions on this issue are divided. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 추가 연구가 이 의문을 해결할 수 있을 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Further research could resolve this question. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 비판적 의견을 수용하며 논의를 발전시키겠습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I accept the critical opinion and is likely to advance the discussion. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 가정을 재검토할 필요가 있다는 데 동의합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I agree that the assumptions need to be re-examined. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학문적 엄밀성의 관점에서 재고해보겠습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I is likely to reconsider this from the perspective of academic rigor. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이론적 논쟁의 핵심을 짚어주셨습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: You have identified the core of the theoretical debate. (academic variant 1)
